title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9600.4 - Confidentiality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9600.4 - Confidentiality

State Regulations
(a) All applicants
and participants have the right to confidentiality concerning any information
provided to determine their eligibility for coverage and any information
discovered in the course of an investigation of eligibility. (b) Information received by the contractor, his agents, employees or any other person or agency concerning applicants for
or participants in the program may be disclosed or used only for purposes
directly related to and necessary for the proper administration of the
program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9600.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
